General.Name: Zhejiang Hengwei Battery Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Hengwei Battery Co., Ltd manufactures and markets battery products in China. It offers alkaline and carbon batteries in blister card and shrink packaging. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Jiaxing, China.
General.Address: No. 77 Zhengyang West Road, Jiaxing, China, 314018
